result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

records.addlTxt:
Defendant Roy Morgan in court, in custody.  Attorney Thomas Evangelos Harris appeared by video for Roy Morgan.  Attorney Alicia H Kort in court for State of Wisconsin.  Deputy Court Clerk:  bm 
Scheduling Conference held.  Defense requests adjourned scheduling date as he has received offer bt parties are still negotiating.  Parties are advised that effective 10/31/2022, pursuant to Chief Judge Directive 22-17, this case will be reassigned to Branch 34, Judge Yamahiro in Room 423 of the Safety Building.
Scheduling conference scheduled for December 13, 2022 at 08:30 am.

Defendant Roy Morgan in court, in custody.  Attorney Thomas Evangelos Harris in court for Roy Morgan.  Attorney Alicia H Kort in court for State of Wisconsin. Deputy Court Clerk:  bm 

Status Conference held.  Attorney Harris officially accepts appointment and requests a scheduling conference date as he needs discovery from prior counsel.
Scheduling conference scheduled for October 28, 2022 at 08:30 am.
Order Appointing Counsel signed and filed.

Defendant Roy Morgan in court, in custody.  Attorney Annette E Rauch in court for Roy Morgan.  Attorney Alicia H Kort in court for State of Wisconsin.  Deputy Court Clerk:  bm 
Case in Court for Final Pretrial.  Defense previously filed Motion to Withdraw.  Court grants motion.  Court appoints Attorney Thomas Harris to represent the Defendant due to Public Defender's Office inability to appoint counsel.  Attorney Harris accepts the appointment.
Status conference scheduled for September 12, 2022 at 08:30 am.  Jury Trial vacated.

records.addlTxt:
Defendant Roy Morgan in court with attorney Annette E Rauch.  Defendant Roy Morgan in custody.  Student Intern Jessica Birmingham under the supervision of Kathryn Ginsberg for Alicia H Kort appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
Case in Court for Scheduling Conference.  Defense has received Discovery from State.  Defendant is having difficulties reviewing Discovery.  Order to be placed if Defendant continues to have difficulties reviewing Discovery.  Defense requested Final Pretrial and Jury Trial dates.  Final pre-trial scheduled for September 9, 2022 at 08:30 am.  Jury trial scheduled for October 7, 2022 at 08:30 am.
Order to View Discovery.  Signed and Filed. nk

Defendant Roy Morgan in court with attorney Annette E Rauch.  Defendant Roy Morgan in custody.  Alicia H Kort appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy Court Clerk: nk
Case in Court for Scheduling Conference.  Defense has received Discovery and request additional time to review.  Scheduling conference scheduled for June 13, 2022 at 01:30 pm.

Defendant Roy Morgan in court with attorney Annette E Rauch. Defendant Roy Morgan in custody. BOTH APPEARED BY VIDEO.  Adam Joseph Best appeared for the State of Wisconsin. 
 Case set for a Preliminary Hearing. Parties are advised that this case is assigned to Branch 12, Judge David Borowski. Defendant waived Preliminary Hearing. Preliminary Hearing Questionnaire and Waiver received and filed. Court held colloquy with defendant. Probable cause has been found and the defendant is bound over for trial.  Original Information e-filed, copy given to defense counsel who waived reading. Defense enters a plea of not guilty on behalf of the defendant. Case is adjourned to Br. 12.  Scheduling conference scheduled for May 5, 2022 at 08:30 am.

Defendant Roy Morgan in court with attorney Annette E Rauch.  Defendant Roy Morgan in custody.  Alicia H Kort appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy Court Clerk:  bm
Case in court for State v Lee Hearing.  Court appointed Attorney Annette Rauch to represent the Defendant at County expense.  Case adjourned for Preliminary Hearing.  Preliminary hearing scheduled for April 15, 2022 at 01:30 pm.
Section 971.23(9) Notice of Intent to Use DNA Evidence at Trial received and filed.  bm
Notice of Appearance received and filed.  bm
Order Appointing Attorney at County Expense signed and filed.  bm

Defendant Roy Morgan not in court, defendant in custody.  Anna Marie Meulbroek appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
Case set for a preliminary hearing. States witness is present. SPD has not appointed counsel. Court ordered case adjourned for a State V. Lee Hearing, branch 12.  Hearing scheduled for April 5, 2022 at 08:30 am.

Defendant Roy Morgan not in court, defendant in custody.  Matthew Zisi appeared by video for the State of Wisconsin.  
Case set for a preliminary hearing. States witness is present. SPD has not appointed counsel. Court ordered case adjourned for CAUSE for a Preliminary Hearing in Preliminary Hearing Court, Room 146 of the Criminal Justice Facility.  This hearing will be streamed live on Dacast:  https://iframe.dacast.com/live/4dafbf46-ed15-c11c-fa22-a58262833632/99073afd-37c2-acfa-830d-b1ddcaebf0ea  Preliminary hearing scheduled for March 23, 2022 at 01:30 pm.

Defendant Roy Morgan not in court, defendant in custody.  Matthew Zisi appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
Case in Court for Preliminary Hearing. SPD has not appointed an attorney on this matter  Preliminary hearing adjourned for cause.  Preliminary hearing scheduled for February 24, 2022 at 01:30 pm.

Defendant Roy Morgan not in court, defendant in custody.  Matthew Zisi appeared by video for the State of Wisconsin.  
Case set for a preliminary hearing. States witness was present. SPD has not appointed counsel. Court ordered case adjourned for CAUSE for a Preliminary Hearing in Preliminary Hearing Court, Room 146 of the Criminal Justice Facility.  This hearing will be streamed live on Dacast:  https://iframe.dacast.com/live/4dafbf46-ed15-c11c-fa22-a58262833632/99073afd-37c2-acfa-830d-b1ddcaebf0ea  Preliminary hearing scheduled for February 4, 2022 at 01:30 pm.

Court ordered defendant TURNED OVER TO Justice Point for Level 5 Supervision with Electronic Monitoring; no contact order.  If electronic monitoring device is unavailable and cash bail has been paid, Defendant to be released and placed on the waiting list.
Signed and filed, No Contact Order.  Defendant to have no contact with SI, JM, JM

Defendant Roy Morgan in court with attorney Ruby De Leon.  Defendant Roy Morgan in custody.  Anthony J Moore appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Roy Morgan appeared by video means with Attorney.  Defendant is advised this case is assigned to Judge Borowski, Branch 12.  Defendant given a copy of the complaint and advised of maximum penalties, right to counsel and right to a Preliminary hearing.  Court reviewed the complaint and found probable cause to hold defendant for further proceedings.   DEFENDANT QUALIFIES FOR PUBLIC DEFENDER REPRESENTATION.  Commissioner advised DNA sample has been obtained from the Defendant.  Court advised Defendant he may qualify to have the DNA sample data expunged if he meets the conditions under Wisconsin Statutes Section 165.77(4).  This hearing will be streamed live on Dacast:  https://iframe.dacast.com/live/4dafbf46-ed15-c11c-fa22-a58262833632/99073afd-37c2-acfa-830d-b1ddcaebf0ea  Preliminary hearing scheduled for January 24, 2022 at 08:30 am.
Defendant in Custody, Court appearance today in Intake Court, Room 137A.
